resources.string:
What's new: Use angle calipers to make angle measurements. Evaluate ECGs for Brugada pattern using new Brugadometer. 

Quick Start: Use your fingers to move and position calipers or move and zoom the image.

Add calipers with the *Add Caliper* menu item, single tap a caliper to select it, tap again to unselect, and double tap to delete a caliper. After calibration the menu items that allow toggling interval and rate and calculating mean rates and QTc will be enabled.

Use the *Image* button on the top right to load and adjust ECG images.

See the *Help* menu item for full help.
